text: Stig Persson (28 November 1934 - 1 July 1968) was a Swedish wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman middleweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1968 deaths Category:Swedish male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Sweden Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:People from Klippan Municipality
title: Stig Persson
